Example Comic Script

Peter Wartman

The first panel here should be big -- really get that stormy atmosphere.

Maybe like this or something?

Panel 1.1

We open on a dark and stormy night.

Panel 1.2

FRED turns to his friend.

Fred

Looking around nervously

Hey Bob, it sure is stormy out here.

Kind of scary.

BOB'S BOBSTINE

You got that right, friend.

Panel 1.3

There is a long and awkward silence.

Panel 2.1

A lightning bolt comes out of nowhere and incinerates both characters. It is grisly and a bit horrifying.

But also funny.

Panel 2.2

Fade to black.

In a comic.

You can figure it out.
